name: beefsteak
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
good qualitybeef (= meat from a cow), or a slice of this: Hamburger steaks consist of finely minced beefsteak seasoned with salt and pepper. Sirloin is a beef steak cut from the rear back portion of the animal. Synonym
steak
More examplesFewer examplesCut the beefsteak into semi-thick cubes and dip in a really good Japanese sauce.Good cuts of beefsteak to use for barbecuing are fillet, porterhouse, T-bone, and rump.Beef steak may be left out for several hours before cooking.
